original_text: The day following, when the people which stood on the other side of the sea saw that there was none other boat there, save that one whereinto his disciples were entered, and that Jesus went not with his disciples into the boat, but that his disciples were gone away alone;
korean_text: 이튿날 바다 건너편에 서 있던 무리가 배 한 척 외에 다른 배가 거기 없는 것과 또 어제 예수께서 제자들과 함께 그 배에 오르지 아니하시고 제자들만 가는 것을 보았더니

sentences.original_text: when the people which stood on the other side of the sea
saw that there was none other boat there,
save that one whereinto his disciples were entered,
and that Jesus went not with his disciples into the boat,
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님께서 제자들과 함께 배에 들어가지 않으심을 보았으며

sentences.original_text: but that his disciples were gone away alone;
